mapper.update:
update nnt_journey
NUM_ROUTE_ID = #{record.numRouteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VC_ROUTE_NO = #{record.vcRouteNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DAT_DEPART_DATE = #{record.datDepartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NUM_SPEND_TIME = #{record.numSpendTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NUM_SEAT = #{record.numSeat,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NUM_ROUTE_STATE = #{record.numRouteState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NUM_ROUTE_FULFEE = #{record.numRouteFulfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NUM_ROUTE_NETFEE = #{record.numRouteNetfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NUM_MANNED_TYPE = #{record.numMannedType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VC_START_AREA = #{record.vcStartArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VC_END_AREA = #{record.vcEndArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DAT_CREAT_DATE = #{record.datCreatDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update nnt_journey set NUM_ROUTE_ID = #{record.numRouteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VC_ROUTE_NO = #{record.vcRouteNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAT_DEPART_DATE = #{record.datDepartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NUM_SPEND_TIME = #{record.numSpendTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUM_SEAT = #{record.numSeat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUM_ROUTE_STATE = #{record.numRouteState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUM_ROUTE_FULFEE = #{record.numRouteFulfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUM_ROUTE_NETFEE = #{record.numRouteNetfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUM_MANNED_TYPE = #{record.numMannedType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VC_START_AREA = #{record.vcStartArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VC_END_AREA = #{record.vcEndArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAT_CREAT_DATE = #{record.datCreatDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update nnt_journey
VC_ROUTE_NO = #{vcRouteNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DAT_DEPART_DATE = #{datDepartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NUM_SPEND_TIME = #{numSpendTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NUM_SEAT = #{numSeat,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NUM_ROUTE_STATE = #{numRouteState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NUM_ROUTE_FULFEE = #{numRouteFulfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NUM_ROUTE_NETFEE = #{numRouteNetfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NUM_MANNED_TYPE = #{numMannedType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VC_START_AREA = #{vcStartArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VC_END_AREA = #{vcEndArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DAT_CREAT_DATE = #{datCreatDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where NUM_ROUTE_ID = #{numRouteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update nnt_journey set VC_ROUTE_NO = #{vcRouteNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAT_DEPART_DATE = #{datDepartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NUM_SPEND_TIME = #{numSpendTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUM_SEAT = #{numSeat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUM_ROUTE_STATE = #{numRouteState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUM_ROUTE_FULFEE = #{numRouteFulfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUM_ROUTE_NETFEE = #{numRouteNetfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUM_MANNED_TYPE = #{numMannedType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VC_START_AREA = #{vcStartArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VC_END_AREA = #{vcEndArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAT_CREAT_DATE = #{datCreatDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where NUM_ROUTE_ID = #{numRouteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
